data.title: Animal Crossing Portal
data.meta_description: The Best Tier Lists for Animal Crossing
data.text:
At Animal Crossing Portal, accessible from, one of our main priorities is the privacy of our visitors. This Privacy Policy document contains types of information that is collected and recorded by Animal Crossing Portal and how we use it.

If you have additional questions or require more information about our Privacy Policy, do not hesitate to contact us. This Privacy Policy applies only to our online activities and is valid for visitors to our website with regards to the information that they shared and/or collect in Animal Crossing Portal. This policy is not applicable to any information collected offline, discord or via channels other than this website.

We don't record sensitive personal information from any of our tier lists or any purpose on this website. This means we don't track ip addresses, email addresses, names, age, or details from users who vote in our polls. Our polls require an email address to sign in as per Google Forms usage to protect against spam, but identity remains anonymous, email addreses aren't recorded. Full spreadsheets of data are provided on the respective tier list pages for all votes.

If you contact us directly, we may receive additional information about you such as your name, email address, phone number, the contents of the message and/or attachments you may send us, and any other information you may choose to provide. This information will not be shared or recorded.

We collect metric information to help us analysis the best usage of our tier lists using Micro Stat. This information includes button clicks, search box queries, villager names searched, drop down usage, filter clicks, searches cancelled, visits to our website and interaction with the tier list. We do not track specific users, all data/identity is kept anonymous.

Animal Crossing Portal's Privacy Policy does not apply to other advertisers or websites. Thus, we are advising you to consult the respective Privacy Policies of these third-party ad servers for more detailed information. It may include their practices and instructions about how to opt-out of certain options.

You can choose to disable cookies through your individual browser options. To know more detailed information about cookie management with specific web browsers, it can be found at the browsers' respective websites.

Another part of our priority is adding protection for children while using the internet. We encourage parents and guardians to observe, participate in, and/or monitor and guide their online activity.

Animal Crossing Portal does not knowingly collect any Personal Identifiable Information from children under the age of 13. If you think that your child provided this kind of information on our website, we strongly encourage you to contact us immediately and we will do our best efforts to promptly remove such information from our records.
